statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{8.00} and height \displaystyle{3.00}. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{3.61} and \displaystyle{6.71}.
What is the area of the shaded inscribed triangle? in²
What is the area of the rectangle? in²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? in²
